snippet: Stocks on Wall Street finished narrowly mixed as anxiety over China’s devaluation dissipated. Major markets in Europe and Asia advanced.
abstract: Markets in Europe and Asia make gains, while American stock markets finish uneven week after China's devaluation of renminbi.
lead_paragraph: Stocks on Wall Street finished narrowly mixed as anxiety over China’s devaluation dissipated. Major markets in Europe and Asia advanced.

headline.main: Markets Steady After Unease About China Subsides
headline.print_headline: Markets Steady After Unease About China Subsides
